Service Details: Sells honey, pollen, beeswax, propolis, fresh fruit, berries and vegetables in season in our Gift Gallery
Hours: Summer: (May 3rd to November 15th)- Mon-Sat: 11:00am - 4:00pm- Sun: Closed- Open Long WeekendsWinter: (November 17th to December 16th)- Open Friday and Saturday only.- Fri-Sat: 11:00am - 4:00pm Tours:- Tours are by appointment only. - Tours are between 10:00am – 11:00am.
